page.title: About Shagoon Seating Chair Mumbai | Premium Furniture Craftsmen
page.description: Learn about Shagoon Seating Chair's 20+ years of crafting premium chairs and tables in Mumbai. Our story, values, and dedication to quality furniture craftsmanship since 2001.

hero.title: About Shagoon Seating Chair Mumbai
hero.description: Crafting exceptional furniture in Mumbai for over two decades, where traditional Indian craftsmanship meets modern design.

story.title: Premium Furniture Makers in Mumbai Since 2001
content: Shagoon Seating Chair was born from a simple belief: that furniture should be more than just functionalâ€”it should inspire, comfort, and reflect the unique personality of those who use it.

Since our founding in 2001 in Mumbai, we have dedicated ourselves to creating premium chairs and tables that stand the test of time. Our journey began in a small workshop with a team of passionate craftsmen who shared a vision of bringing exceptional furniture to modern Indian homes and offices.
Today, we continue to honor that vision by combining traditional woodworking techniques with contemporary design principles, ensuring every piece we create is both beautiful and built to last.

values.title: Our Values
values.subtitle: The principles that guide everything we do

items.title: Quality Craftsmanship
items.description: Every piece is meticulously crafted by skilled artisans using time-honored techniques and the finest materials available.

items.title: Sustainability
items.description: We source our materials responsibly and use eco-friendly processes, ensuring our beautiful furniture doesn't come at the planet's expense.

items.title: Innovation
items.description: We continuously evolve our designs and techniques, embracing new technologies while respecting traditional craftsmanship methods.

team.title: Meet Our Team
team.subtitle: The passionate craftspeople behind every piece of furniture

members.name: Rajesh Kumar
members.description: With over 25 years of experience in furniture making, Rajesh established Shagoon Seating Chair with a vision to create timeless pieces.

members.name: Priya Sharma
members.description: Priya brings contemporary design sensibilities to traditional craftsmanship, ensuring every piece is both beautiful and functional.

image.svg: <circle cx="150" cy="120" r="60" fill="var(--secondary-color)" opacity="0.6"/><circle cx="150" cy="100" r="25" fill="var(--accent-color)" opacity="0.8"/><rect x="120" y="140" width="60" height="40" rx="20" fill="var(--primary-color)" opacity="0.7"/>

members.name: Arjun Patel
members.description: Arjun ensures that every piece meets our exacting standards before it reaches our customers' homes and offices.

process.title: Our Crafting Process
process.subtitle: From concept to completion, every step is carefully executed

steps.title: Design & Planning
steps.description: Every piece begins with careful design and planning, considering both aesthetics and functionality.

steps.title: Material Selection
steps.description: We source only the finest materials, ensuring quality and sustainability in every piece.

steps.title: Expert Craftsmanship
steps.description: Our skilled artisans bring each design to life using traditional techniques and modern tools.

steps.title: Quality Control
steps.description: Every piece undergoes rigorous quality checks to ensure it meets our exacting standards.

steps.title: Finishing & Delivery
steps.description: Final finishing touches are applied before careful packaging and delivery to your door.
